name: Notedlinks
tag_list: widget, related-content, related-content-plugin, semantic, contextual, plugin, related
overview:
Notedlinks is a semantic widget that improves the reading experience. We offer in-text related contents to any text website to improve page views and Bounce Rate.

When a website includes our JavaScript on their web code, we read and understand the text (semantic disambiguation), and then we highlight the more relevant concepts of the text and when the user click on this concepts we show related contents from Wikipedia, Twitter, YouTube, and others.

The benefits include:

  • Increased profits and page-views.
  • Improved SEO.
  • Improved reading experience.
  • External links without letting the users leave the site.
  • More internal links.

NotedLinks is a freemium service. The service is free with advertisements for small websites and has a subscription model without advertisements and with more customization options for bigger clients.
